EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - Unusable File Uploaded
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - Unusable File Uploaded
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Waiting For Your File(s) {!Case.CaseNumber}
Dear {!Contact.Name},
We have received the files(s) you uploaded to Data Services. Upon reviewing the file(s), we notice they are not the right file type to continue with our recovery process. Please upload the correct file as soon as possible.
Provided are accepted formats of QuickBooks company files:
(.QBW, .QBB, .QBM, .QBA, .QPB, .QPT, .QB201X, .QBBMac).
For 3rd party conversions you may be asked to upload the company file from the software you are currently using, or to send multiple Excel sheets.
When we receive the new copy of the file(s), you will receive a new Quote/Date of completion. We will continue to send reminders until a file is uploaded or you cancel the request. Failing to respond may result in the case being closed.
New with Data Services!
* Visit the Data Services Case Status Information page to get the latest updates with your company file, if you lost your File Transfer PIN, or QuickBooks Password. * Communicate with the agent assigned to your case without having to leave a voicemail or send an separate email.
Ready to upload?
1. Click the following link http://intuitb2b.force.com/FileExchange (If the link doesn't work, copy and paste the address into your browser). 2. Enter the information and click the I have read and agree to the Terms of Servicecheck box. 3. Click Submit. 4. In the Customer File Upload section, click add. 5. Browse your computer for your company file (.QBW, .QBB, .QBM, .QBA, .QPB, .QPT, .QB201X, .QBBMac). 6. Once found, select it and click Open. 7. Click Start Upload.
The upload site will inform you when the upload has been completed.
Note: If you have multiple files to upload, they must be uploaded separately.
What's next?
You'll receive emails from us throughout the stages of repairing your file. We may contact you by phone or email if there are additional questions we have.
Thank you, Intuit Data Services icu_status@intuit.com
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
